user_management.title: User Management
user_management.add_edit_remove: Add, edit, or remove users (patients, counselors, therapists).
user_management.view_progress: View mental health progress for each user.

session_management.title: Session Management
session_management.track_attendance: Track attendance and completion of sessions.

content_management.title: Content Management
content_management.upload: Upload blogs, motivational content, meditation guides, or exercises.
content_management.control_visibility: Control which content shows up on the user side.

mood_tracker.title: Mood Tracker Heatmap
mood_tracker.desc: Color-coded calendar view of usersâ€™ mood entries. Helps visualize overall mental health trends.

ai_sentiment.title: AI Sentiment Insights
ai_sentiment.desc: AI analyzes journal entries / chat interactions and generates emotional insights. Dashboard shows which emotions are most common (stress, joy, anxiety).

engagement.title: Engagement Dashboard
engagement.track_usage: Track how many users are actively checking resources, journaling, or booking sessions.
engagement.gamify: Gamify engagement with points or streaks.

crisis_alerts.title: Crisis Alerts Panel
crisis_alerts.highlight_risk: Highlight users at risk (suicidal thoughts, extremely low mood).
crisis_alerts.priority_actions: Priority alerts with therapist action buttons.

wellness_scorecards.title: Wellness Scorecards
wellness_scorecards.desc: Aggregate data into a 'Wellness Index' for each user. Graphs to show before vs. after therapy progress.

test_page.title: Test Page
test_page.desc1: This is a minimal test page to check if React rendering is working.
test_page.desc2: If you see this, then the basic rendering pipeline is functional.
test_page.desc3: The issue must be in one of the components or CSS.

resource_hub.title: Resource Hub
resource_hub.intro: Videos, relaxation audio, and mental wellness guides in regional languages.

admin_dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
admin_dashboard.intro: Anonymous data analytics for authorities to recognize trends and plan interventions.
admin_dashboard.analytics_placeholder: (Analytics charts and trends will appear here.)

mental_health_assessments.title: Mental Health Assessments
mental_health_assessments.description: Take PHQ-9, GAD-7, GHQ, and MBTI tests to understand your mental health and personality type.

ai_therapist.title: AI-Powered Therapist
ai_therapist.description: Get personalized mental health guidance from our AI therapist trained on psychological best practices.

peer_support.title: Peer Support Network
peer_support.description: Connect with trained student volunteers and faculty mentors who understand your journey.

professional_psychiatrists.title: Professional Psychiatrists
professional_psychiatrists.description: Book appointments with licensed psychiatrists when you need professional medical care.

personalized_reports.title: Personalized Reports
personalized_reports.description: Download detailed mental health reports with your assessment results and recommendations.

multi_language_support.title: Multi-Language Support
multi_language_support.description: Access mental health support in your preferred language with our translation feature.

home_page.comprehensive_tools: Comprehensive tools designed to support your mental health journey
home_page.real_experiences: Real experiences from students who found their path to better mental health

testimonials.quote: Psych Sync helped me understand my stress patterns and connected me with a peer who really got what I was going through.
testimonials.author: Anonymous Student

testimonials.quote: The assessment was quick but thorough. I finally felt heard and got practical next steps instead of generic advice.
testimonials.author: Anonymous Student

testimonials.quote: Having my results in a PDF I could share with my counselor made the transition to professional help so much smoother.
testimonials.author: Anonymous Student

home_page.take_first_step: Take the first step towards better mental health with our quick, confidential assessment.
